title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: A directory named "subpackage" is created under the existing "subpackage" directory when compiling the class using the ajc command without the -d option.
EB: When compiling the class using the ajc command without the -d option, a directory named "subpackage" should not be created under the existing "subpackage" directory.
SR: Add the -d option while compiling classes from the subpackage using the ajc command.
